pages.text: At this point 99 Mods plays a lot like a vanilla game, $(o)though with some great tools and weapons$(). Therefore, it would be wise to find a village as soon as possible for getting resources and villager trades going. I will link some good videos in the Videos chapter to help get started.

pages.title: Tools
pages.text: Once you get an Iron Pick try to get some gems from More Gems to make some really nice early game tools, weapons, and armor. Go to the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/more-gems-fabric)More Gems mod page$() to see the mod content, material durability, and much more!
